description: Main entry point for a Flutter application, defining the app structure with main classes, widgets, theme, and UI layout.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title property.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage managing the UI build.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main function that initializes the Flutter app and runs MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the widget that constructs its UI.
